name: MARMELADE
description:
My entry for the Disc Room Game Jam 

Avoid becoming delicious breakfast for as long as you can

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Controllers *should* be supported, but might not work

Use wasd/arrows and f/shift/space instead

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Music by Frankumjay sounds
